cz.ive.genius
Class AreaGeniusImpl

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.genius.BasicGenius
      cz.ive.genius.AreaGeniusImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AreaGenius, Genius, Updateable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
QueueGenius
public class AreaGeniusImpl
extends BasicGenius
implements AreaGenius

Basic implementation of the area genius. It is still expected to be overidden to support specific behavior.

Author:
ondra
See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

areaId

protected java.lang.String areaId
Id of the associated location

processTable

protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> processTable
Delegation process table. It is a map from processId of the DelegatedProcessTemplates to the goalId of the goals to be fullfilled for the given process.

protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> specialGoals

cleaningGoals

protected java.util.List<Pair<TriggerTemplate,java.lang.String>> cleaningGoals
List of goals that can be executed before stoping delegated process.

Method Detail

activate

public void activate()
Description copied from class: BasicGenius
All given goals are activated (genius will start fulfilling them) in this method.

Specified by:
activate in interface Genius
Overrides:
activate in class BasicGenius

deactivate

public void deactivate()
All goals and processes are deactivated. All hooks and all connection to the world is disposed. Also all passive queries should be unregistered here.

Specified by:
deactivate in interface Genius
Overrides:
deactivate in class BasicGenius

setDelegationTable

public void setDelegationTable(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> table)
Description copied from interface: AreaGenius
Sets up the delegation table. It is a map from processId of the DelegatedProcessTemplates to the goalId of the goals to be fullfilled for the given process.

Specified by:
setDelegationTable in interface AreaGenius
Parameters:
table - The new delegation table.

                                     ProcessExecution execution)
Description copied from interface: AreaGenius
Passes the given process to this area genius.

Specified by:
startDelegation in interface AreaGenius
Parameters:

stopDelegation

public ProcessResult stopDelegation(ProcessExecution execution)
Description copied from interface: AreaGenius
Asks the the area genius to stop the given process. It may, but does not have to, do so immediately.

Specified by:
stopDelegation in interface AreaGenius
Parameters:
execution - Execution of the process which delegation to finish.
Returns:
ProcessResult signaling current state of the delegation. Explicitely RUNNING state means that the delegation will continue for a while and then itself call stop() on the process.

interruptDelegation

public void interruptDelegation(ProcessExecution execution)
Description copied from interface: AreaGenius
This method instantly stops the delegation. It is called as a consequence of the LOD changes.

Specified by:
interruptDelegation in interface AreaGenius
Parameters:
execution - ProcessExecution of the process which delegation to finish instantly.

selectSpecialProcess

protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> selectSpecialProcess(RuleTreeNode rule)
Manually selects the best implementation for the given rule (and thus a goal).

Parameters:
rule - Rule for which to find the best implementation.
Returns:
Set of ids of processes to be preferred as an implementation of this goal.

actorGained

protected void actorGained(IveObject actor)
Actor becomes delegated to this genius. Descendants of this class can use this method to assign the actors to different processes in the controlled area.

Parameters:
actor - The actor IveObject.

actorLost

protected void actorLost(IveObject actor)
Actor is no more delegated to this genius. Descendants of this class can use this method to assign the actors to different processes in the controlled area.

Parameters:
actor - The actor IveObject.

shouldClean

protected java.lang.String shouldClean(AreaGeniusImpl.AcceptedGoal info)
Should we run the cleaning process?

Parameters:
info - Info about the accepted goal
Returns:
Goal id of the cleaning goal if there is a cleaning goal that should be run or null if there is no need to run any cleaning goal.

runCleaning

private void runCleaning(AreaGeniusImpl.AcceptedGoal info,
                         java.lang.String goalId)
Run the cleaning process.

Parameters:
info - Info about the accepted goal
goalId - Id of the cleaning to be run.
